citations.narrative:
4 rabbits were housed outdoors in enclosures that chickens and peafowl were housed in. Cohousing rabbits with other
species may result in disease or injury. The facility must ensure that the rabbits are housed only with other rabbits.
Corrected during the inspection on 15 October 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.58(a) 
   
Classification and separation. 
4 rabbits were housed outdoors in enclosures that chickens and peafowl were housed in. Cohousing rabbits with other 
species may result in disease or injury. The facility must ensure that the rabbits are housed only with other rabbits. 
 
Corrected during the inspection on 15 October 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
